name: Space Invaded (hadiDanial)
description:
Note: Restart doesn't work properly atm, can't upload a fix until the ratings are over however :( Sorry

Pirates are attacking your ship! You must fight back! 
Oh... someone forgot to load all the weapons. You only have the standard, weak gun. Better get them to shoot each other then.

This game was made in less than 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2018. All assets made by me, sound effects generated by BFXR, and the music is from here.
